timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	FIELD field_19314 hasWarnedAboutInvalidness Z
          
          
            
            	FIELD field_19314 invalid Z
timeline.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText: I disagree with this change, this boolean is only set to true once the warning has been outputted.  If it finds that it is invalid, it triggers the method which checks if this is true, so this isn't if it is invalid, it is if it has already outputted it to prevent console spam.
replies.author: RDIL

replies.bodyText: maybe markedInvalid then as it's shorter?
replies.author: YanisBft
